| Domestos | Clear chorine based bleach agent | 30ml per 5 litres water | Weekly or as required. | Avoid splashing in eyes or prolonged skin contact. | Store in a cool place in an upright position, store away from direct sunlight | **Toilets** |
| Instant Hand Sanatiser | Clear liquid | 1:1 | As required | The product does not contain any relevant quantities of material with critical values that have to be monitored at the workplace | Store in cool dry area | Hands |
| Maxisan | Yellow liquid | 10ml to 1l water | As required | Donâ€™t swallow. If splashed in Eyes wash well. | Store in a cool place | Cleaner Disinfectant |
| Antibacterial Spray Soap | Clear liquid | 1:1 | As required | The product does not contain any relevant quantities of material with critical values that have to be monitored at the workplace | Store in cool dry area | Hands |
| SYNBAC Antibacterial Spray Soap | Clear blue liquid | 1:1 | As required | The product does not contain any relevant quantities of material with critical values that have to be monitored at the workplace | Store in cool dry area | Hands |
| Maxisolv | Clear Red Liquid | 10ml to 2.5l water | As required | Avoid prolonged contact with skin | Store in cool dry area | Floors, walls, windows |
| Cleen Green | Green liquid. | 10:1 | As required | Do not swallow. Avoid food contact surfaces. | Store in cool dry area. Production Cupboard | Machinery and Equipment. Non-food contact surfaces. |
| Gendet | Green liquid | 5ml to 1 litre of water | As Required | Prolonged contact with strong GENDET solutions will tend to dry out sensitive skin | Store in cool dry area | Dishes |
